feed.title: GitHub HTML Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of HTML in GitHub

entry.title: sanskarmalkhede/basic-programs
entry.summary:
Add your programs you made while learning new programming languages

Add your programs you made while learning new programming languages

Special Note For Everyone

'''
always make more then 4 pull request
lets you have made only 4 pull request to different projects
but one project is excluded from hackoctoberfest event then your pull request will not be count and 
then you have remains 3 valid pull request if these projects is not excluded.
if you fail to make 4 pull request then you cant get swags or t-shirts.

i will recommend you make pull request to your own repo which is very very saffest side for you..
keep in mind that repo has hacktoberfest topic..
'''

âœ¨Hacktoberfest 2022âœ¨

A SimpleğŸ˜‰ beginner friendlyğŸ˜Š Repo for all programmers and coders. All contributors are requested to starğŸŒŸthis repo and and Follow me.
(ğŸ›‘Required)

ğŸ‘ Awesome! How and What can I Contribute?

  • âš“Star this repo to get latest updates.
  • âš“Fork this repository by click the Fork button in the top right of this page or simply click here.
  • âš“Create a new file and add a new Program code(like C++ program to implement Binary Search, etc.) in any programming language like C++, Java, Python, etc. (Note: Program must not be exist already in this repository)
  • âš“First, you have to create an issue with a proper description. then I will assign issue with hacktoberfest label. after that you have to make pull request then If the changes are ok then I will merge your PR with hacktoberfest-accepted label.
  • âš“Put your files in correct folder like .py in Python, .js in Javascript etc.
  • âš“After adding the code, Commit your changes.
  • âš“Create a new pull request from your forked repository (Button located at the top of your repo)
  • âš“You can follow MEğŸ˜.

ğŸŒŸLanguages

  • ğŸ’» C
  • ğŸ’» C#
  • ğŸ’» C++
  • ğŸ’» HTML
  • ğŸ’» PHP
  • ğŸ’» Python
  • ğŸ’» Java
  • ğŸ’» Javascript

What is Hacktoberfest?

  • A month-long celebration from October 1st - 31st sponsored by Digital Ocean and GitHub to get people involved in Open Source. Create your very first pull request to any public repository on GitHub and contribute to the open source developer community.

https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/

ğŸ“’Note

All contributors who have followed the rules to contribute get successfully merged PR. Don't forget to follow!!!

Have some patience to get successfully merged PR. Keep Patience!!!

HAPPY HACKINGğŸ¤â¤ğŸ’»!!!

Contributors

Thanks to these wonderful people âœ¨

entry.title: OCA/server-ux
entry.summary:
server-ux

None

Available addons

addon version maintainers summary
barcode_action 14.0.1.0.1 Allows to use barcodes as a launcher
base_cancel_confirm 14.0.1.0.3 Base Cancel Confirm
base_custom_filter 14.0.1.0.0 Add custom filters in standard filters and group by dropdowns
base_export_manager 14.0.1.0.1 Manage model export profiles
base_import_security_group 14.0.1.0.0 Group-based permissions for importing CSV files
base_menu_visibility_restriction 14.0.1.0.0 Restrict (with groups) menu visibilty
base_optional_quick_create 14.0.1.0.0 Avoid "quick create" on m2o fields, on a "by model" basis
base_revision 14.0.1.1.0 Keep track of revised document
base_search_custom_field_filter 14.0.1.1.1 Add custom filters for fields via UI
base_substate 14.0.1.0.0 Base Sub State
base_technical_features 14.0.1.1.1 Access to technical features without activating debug mode
base_tier_validation 14.0.2.12.0 Implement a validation process based on tiers.
base_tier_validation_formula 14.0.2.0.1 Formulas for Base tier validation
base_tier_validation_forward 14.0.1.0.2 Forward option for base tiers
base_tier_validation_report 14.0.1.1.0 Reports related to tier validation
base_tier_validation_server_action 14.0.1.1.3 Add option to call server action when a tier is validated
base_user_locale 14.0.1.1.1 User Locale Settings
chained_swapper 14.0.1.0.1 Chained Swapper
date_range 14.0.2.1.1 Manage all kind of date range
date_range_account 14.0.1.0.0 Add Date Range menu entry in Invoicing app
default_multi_user 14.0.1.0.0 Allows to share user-defined defaults among several users.
document_quick_access 14.0.1.0.0 Document quick access
document_quick_access_folder_auto_classification 14.0.2.1.0 Auto classification of Documents after reading a QR
filter_multi_user 14.0.1.0.0 Allows to share user-defined filters filters among several users.
mass_editing 14.0.1.1.1 Mass Editing
mass_operation_abstract 14.0.1.0.2 Abstract Tools used for modules that realize operation on many items
multi_step_wizard 14.0.1.0.0 Multi-Steps Wizards
sequence_check_digit 14.0.1.0.2 Adds a check digit on sequences
sequence_range_end 14.0.1.0.0 Sequence prefix/suffix option, 'range_end_', to use the beginning of the range
sequence_reset_period 14.0.1.0.0 Auto-generate yearly/monthly/weekly/daily sequence period ranges
server_action_domain 14.0.1.0.0 Apply a domain filter before executing server actions on records

Licenses

This repository is licensed under AGPL-3.0.

However, each module can have a totally different license, as long as they adhere to Odoo Community Association (OCA) policy. Consult each module's __manifest__.py file, which contains a license key that explains its license.

OCA, or the Odoo Community Association, is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to support the collaborative development of Odoo features and promote its widespread use.
